text: Tufts University is a private research university in Medford and Somerville, Massachusetts. It was founded in 1852 by Christian universalists.Concise Encyclopedia of Tufts History "Tufts University, 1852" It was a small New England liberal arts college until its transformation into a larger research university in the 1970s.Gittleman, Sol. "America's Hot 25 Schools." Newsweek Kaplan College Guide. Tufts has a campus in Medford / Somerville area. The School of Arts and Sciences and School of Engineering are on the Medford / Somerville campus. It has another campus in Downtown Boston.
